casebody.data:
Tony R. SMITH
v.
Staci BARBOUR and
Bilal Kanawati. No. 24P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. James F. (Rik) Lovett Jr., Raleigh, for Staci Day Barbour. Helen M. Oliver, for Tony R. Smith. Marc Sokol, for Bilal Kanawati. Lori Christian, for Guardian Ad Litem.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th day of January 2005 by Defendant (Staci Day Barbour) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of March 2005."
